item.title: Changing ip in Client
item.dc:creator: @pk2play pk2play
item.description:
@pk2play wrote:

Ok so recently I finally figured out how to port forward my comp lul.

I changed the ip in these places

if(myPrivilege >= 2 || server.equals("IP HERE") || 1 == 1) { if(inputString.equals("region")) { System.out.println("Current region: " + anInt1069 + ", " + anInt1070); }

And also I seen this

But I do not know if I need to add the ip in there because it was blank.

Also it lets other people connect but not me.

Thanks for the help
